name: 3dBrainSync
author: AFNI Team
description: 'Synchronizes' the -inset2 dataset to match the -inset1 dataset, using orthogonal or permutation transformation.

inputs.description: Dataset to be matched to the reference dataset
inputs.name: Dataset to Match

inputs.description: Specifies the output dataset to be used for the orthogonal matrix transformation
inputs.name: Orthogonal Matrix Output Prefix

inputs.description: Specifies the output dataset to be used for the permutation transformation
inputs.name: Permutation Output Prefix

inputs.description: Normalize the output dataset(s) so that each time series has sum-of-squares = 1
inputs.name: Normalize Output

inputs.description: Only operate on nonzero voxels in the mask dataset
inputs.name: Mask Dataset

inputs.description: Print some progress reports and auxiliary information
inputs.name: Verbose

output-files.description: Output dataset after orthogonal matrix transformation
output-files.name: Orthogonal Matrix Output

output-files.description: Singular values from the BC' decomposition
output-files.name: Singular Values
